instructions.reason_for_call: You want to know if the digital camera you just bought is 10x zoom. If not, modify the item to 10x zoom without changing the other options. 1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).
